1: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> לִבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for the sons</n> קֹ֬רַח <sup>7141 </sup> <n>of Korah</n> מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> שִׁמְעוּ־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> זֹ֭את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>this all [ye] people</n> הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינוּ <sup>238 </sup> <n>give ear</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>all [ye] inhabitants</n> חָֽלֶד׃ <sup>2465 </sup> <n>of the world</n>
2: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Both</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> אָ֭דָם <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Both</n> בְּנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>he</n> יַ֝֗חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> עָשִׁ֥יר <sup>6223 </sup> <n>rich</n> וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <sup>34 </sup> <n>and poor</n>
3: פִּ֭י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>My mouth</n> יְדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>shall speak</n> חָכְמ֑וֹת <sup>2454 </sup> <n>of wisdom</n> וְהָג֖וּת <sup>1900 </sup> <n>and the meditation</n> לִבִּ֣י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>of my heart</n> תְבוּנֽוֹת׃ <sup>8394 </sup> <n>[shall be] of understanding</n>
4: אַטֶּ֣ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>I will incline</n> לְמָשָׁ֣ל <sup>4912 </sup> <n>to a parable</n> אָזְנִ֑י <sup>241 </sup> <n>mine ear</n> אֶפְתַּ֥ח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>I will open</n> בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <sup>3658 </sup> <n>upon the harp</n> חִידָתִֽי׃ <sup>2420 </sup> <n>my dark saying</n>
5: לָ֣מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> אִ֭ירָא <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Wherefore should I fear</n> בִּ֣ימֵי <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the days</n> רָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of evil</n> עֲוֹ֖ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>[when] the iniquity</n> עֲקֵבַ֣י <sup>6120 </sup> <n>of my heels</n> יְסוּבֵּֽנִי׃ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>shall compass</n>
6: הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <sup>982 </sup> <n>They that trust</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> חֵילָ֑ם <sup>2428 </sup> <n>in their wealth</n> וּבְרֹ֥ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>themselves in the multitude</n> עָ֝שְׁרָ֗ם <sup>6239 </sup> <n>of their riches</n> יִתְהַלָּֽלוּ׃ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>and boast</n>
7: אָ֗ח <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> פָדֹ֣ה <sup>6299 </sup> <n>by any means</n> יִפְדֶּ֣ה <sup>6299 </sup> <n>redeem</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>None [of them] can</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Or</n> יִתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>nor give</n> לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>to God</n> כָּפְרֽוֹ׃ <sup>3724 </sup> <n>a ransom</n>
8: וְ֭יֵקַר <sup>3365 </sup> <n>[is] precious</n> פִּדְי֥וֹן <sup>6306 </sup> <n>(For the redemption</n> נַפְשָׁ֗ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of their soul</n> וְחָדַ֥ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>and it ceaseth</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>forever</n>
9: וִֽיחִי־ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>That he should still live</n> ע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>on</n> לָנֶ֑צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>for ever</n> לֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִרְאֶ֣ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>[and] not see</n> הַשָּֽׁחַת׃ <sup>7845 </sup> <n>corruption</n>
10: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יִרְאֶ֨ה ׀ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>For he seeth</n> חֲכָ֘מִ֤ים <sup>2450 </sup> <n>[that] wise men</n> יָמ֗וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>die</n> יַ֤חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>likewise</n> כְּסִ֣יל <sup>3684 </sup> <n>the fool</n> וָבַ֣עַר <sup>1198 </sup> <n>and the brutish person</n> יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <sup>6 </sup> <n>perish</n> וְעָזְב֖וּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and leave</n> לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים <sup>312 </sup> <n>to others</n> חֵילָֽם׃ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>their wealth</n>
11: קִרְבָּ֤ם <sup>7130 </sup> <n>Their inward</n> בָּתֵּ֨ימוֹ ׀ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>thought [is that] their houses</n> לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[shall continue] for ever</n> מִ֭שְׁכְּנֹתָם <sup>4908 </sup> <n>[and] their dwelling</n> לְדֹ֣ר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>places to all</n> וָדֹ֑ר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n> קָֽרְא֥וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>they call</n> בִ֝שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>after their own names</n> עֲלֵ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֲדָמֽוֹת׃ <sup>127 </sup> <n>[their] lands</n>
12: וְאָדָ֣ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>Nevertheless man</n> בִּ֭יקָר <sup>3366 </sup> <n>[being] in honour</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>will not</n> יָלִ֑ין <sup>3885 </sup> <n>abideth</n> נִמְשַׁ֖ל <sup>4911 </sup> <n>not he is like</n> כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת <sup>929 </sup> <n>the beasts</n> נִדְמֽוּ׃ <sup>1820 </sup> <n>[that] perish</n>
13: זֶ֣ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> דַ֭רְכָּם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>This their way</n> כֵּ֣סֶל <sup>3689 </sup> <n>[is] their folly</n> לָ֑מוֹ וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֓ם ׀ <sup>310 </sup> <n>yet their posterity</n> בְּפִיהֶ֖ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>their sayings</n> יִרְצ֣וּ <sup>7521 </sup> <n>approve</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
14: כַּצֹּ֤אן ׀ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>Like sheep</n> לִֽשְׁא֣וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>in the grave</n> שַׁתּוּ֮ <sup>8371 </sup> <n>they are laid</n> מָ֤וֶת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>death</n> יִ֫רְעֵ֥ם <sup>7462 </sup> <n>shall feed</n> וַיִּרְדּ֘וּ <sup>7287 </sup> <n>shall have dominion</n> בָ֤ם יְשָׁרִ֨ים ׀ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>on them and the upright</n> לַבֹּ֗קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>over them in the morning</n> [וְצִירָם כ] (וְ֭צוּרָם <sup>6736 </sup> <n>beauty</n> ק) לְבַלּ֥וֹת <sup>1086 </sup> <n>shall consume</n> שְׁא֗וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>in the grave</n> מִזְּבֻ֥ל <sup>2073 </sup> <n>from their dwelling</n> לֽוֹ׃
15: אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>but</n> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>But God</n> יִפְדֶּ֣ה <sup>6299 </sup> <n>will redeem</n> נַ֭פְשִׁי <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> מִֽיַּד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>from the power</n> שְׁא֑וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>of the grave</n> כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יִקָּחֵ֣נִי <sup>3947 </sup> <n>for he shall receive</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>me Selah</n>
16: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּ֭ירָא <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Be not thou afraid</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> יַעֲשִׁ֣ר <sup>6238 </sup> <n>is made rich</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>when one</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יִ֝רְבֶּה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>is increased</n> כְּב֣וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>when the glory</n> בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of his house</n>
17: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בְ֭מוֹתוֹ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>For when he dieth</n> יִקַּ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>he shall carry nothing away</n> הַכֹּ֑ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יֵרֵ֖ד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>shall not descend</n> אַחֲרָ֣יו <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>his glory</n>
18: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Though</n> נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his soul</n> בְּחַיָּ֣יו <sup>2416 </sup> <n>Though while he lived</n> יְבָרֵ֑ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>he blessed</n> וְ֝יוֹדֻ֗ךָ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>and [men] will praise</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> תֵיטִ֥יב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>thee when thou doest well</n> לָֽךְ׃
19: תָּ֭בוֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>He shall go</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> דּ֣וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>to the generation</n> אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his fathers</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> נֵ֝֗צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>alway</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִרְאוּ־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>see</n> אֽוֹר׃ <sup>216 </sup> <n>light</n>
20: אָדָ֣ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>Man</n> בִּ֭יקָר <sup>3366 </sup> <n>[that is] in honour</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> יָבִ֑ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>and understandeth</n> נִמְשַׁ֖ל <sup>4911 </sup> <n>not is like</n> כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת <sup>929 </sup> <n>the beasts</n> נִדְמֽוּ׃ <sup>1820 </sup> <n>[that] perish</n>
